snippet.title: Dragon's Lair Full Playthrough (SNES)
snippet.description:
The original Dragon's Lair is one of my favourite game. While I completely dislike the NES version, I admit I have some affection for the SNES version even though it's very flawed and rather frustrating at times.

This is a full playthrough of the game but I didn't do all levels since some are just dead-ends that leads to nowhere on the map. This is also my first legit run through the entire game and to my surprise, it was rather easy and even fun until one level near the end.

Thanks for watching and I hope you enjoy this video.
